meanings.definition: Of or relating to an adventitia.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the adventitial layer of the blood vessel.
meanings.sent2: The adventitial tissue provides support to the organ.
meanings.sent3: The adventitial covering of the vessel seemed to be waving hello.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the adventitial layer of the vessel.
meanings.sent5: The adventitial layer acted as a shield, protecting the inner parts of the vessel.

meanings.definition: Situated near or toward the outside of an organ or structure.
meanings.sent1: The adventitial position of the organ made it vulnerable to injury.
meanings.sent2: The adventitial side of the structure faced the open field.
meanings.sent3: The adventitial location of the tree made it easy to spot from afar.
meanings.sent4: Her adventurous spirit matched the organ's adventitial placement.
meanings.sent5: The adventitial edge of the building overlooked the bustling city below.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the outermost layer of a blood vessel.
meanings.sent1: The surgeon carefully examined the adventitial layer of the blood vessel.
meanings.sent2: The adventitial covering of the vessel protects it from damage.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous squirrel climbed the adventitial layer of the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the adventitial layer of the vessel.
meanings.sent5: The adventitial sheath of the vessel gleamed under the bright light.
